description: Computes eigenvalues and eigenvectors for an input dataset of tensors

input_dataset.title: Input Dataset
input_dataset.description: Input dataset of Dxx, Dxy, Dyy, Dxz, Dyz, Dzz sub-bricks

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Use the given prefix for the output dataset

datum.title: Output Data Type
datum.description: Coerce the output data to be stored as the given type (byte, short, or float).

sep_dsets.title: Separate Datasets Flag
sep_dsets.description: Save eigenvalues, vectors, FA, and MD in separate datasets

uddata.title: Upper Diagonal Data Flag
uddata.description: Tensor data is stored as upper diagonal instead of lower diagonal
